name: Unpredictable Powers
description:
' Unpredictable powers ' - it's top down shooter. You play as wizard who fights against monsters randomly  (Currently there are 21 skills)  casting skills.

----------------------------------------------------------------

This is my first project and I'm just testing my skills. I just wanted finally start and finish something. It must be finished before February... I hope so...

ENJOY THE GAME! TATAKAE!
